dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.fmkspec.PolicySetSpec
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class that is used to define the invariant characteristics (attributes, methods, constraints and relationships) of a PolicySet entity. It is further refined by the PolicyRuleSpec.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: PolicySetSpec

child.name: decisionStrategy
child.description:
This is an enumerated integer that specifies the particular decision strategy to be used in this PolicySet. Values include: 0: Unknown 1: MatchFirst 2: MatchAll MatchFirst enforces the actions of the first rule that evaluates to TRUE; policy evaluation then STOPS, meaning that all subsequent rules are no longer evaluated. MatchAll enforces the actions of all rules that evaluate to TRUE. This is equivalent to performing two passes through the rule set. The first pass gathers all PolicyRules that evaluate to true and places them in a group. The second pass then executes only those rules that evaluated to true. Execution of these rules is controlled through the Priority property (on the aggregation PolicySetComponent), which defines the order in which the PolicyRules execute.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: decisionStrategy

child.name: policySet
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association SpecifiesPolicySet

This association end is optional
child.label: policySet
